languages.text: {n}Арджента тяжело дышит, однако уверенно держится за оружие, направленное на Маражая.{/n} "Воля Твоя да укрепит мою руку, вера в Тебя да придаст мне сил..."
{n}Argenta is panting, but her weapon is steadily trained on Marazhai.{/n} "May Thy will fortify my hand, may my faith in Thee grant me strength..."
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента тяжело дышит, однако уверенно держится за оружие, направленное на Маражая.{/n} "Воля Твоя да укрепит мою руку, вера в Тебя да придаст мне сил..."

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔喘着粗气，但手中的武器始终对准玛拉斋。{/n}“愿你的意志让我的双手毫不动摇，愿我对你的信仰赐予我力量……”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta is panting, but her weapon is steadily trained on Marazhai.{/n} "May Thy will fortify my hand, may my faith in Thee grant me strength..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔喘着粗气，但手中的武器始终对准玛拉斋。{/n}“愿你的意志让我的双手毫不动摇，愿我对你的信仰赐予我力量……”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta está jadeando, pero su arma sigue apuntando a Marazhai.{/n} «Que Su voluntad guíe mi mano y que mi fe en Él me conceda fuerza...».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta is panting, but her weapon is steadily trained on Marazhai.{/n} "May Thy will fortify my hand, may my faith in Thee grant me strength..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta está jadeando, pero su arma sigue apuntando a Marazhai.{/n} «Que Su voluntad guíe mi mano y que mi fe en Él me conceda fuerza...».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta est essoufflée, mais pointe son arme en direction de Marazhai sans faiblir.{/n} « Que Ta volonté guide ma main, que ma foi m'octroie la force... »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta is panting, but her weapon is steadily trained on Marazhai.{/n} "May Thy will fortify my hand, may my faith in Thee grant me strength..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta est essoufflée, mais pointe son arme en direction de Marazhai sans faiblir.{/n} « Que Ta volonté guide ma main, que ma foi m'octroie la force... »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta keucht, hält dabei ihre Waffe aber fest auf Marazhai gerichtet.{/n} "Möge Euer Wille meine Hand stärken, möge mir mein Glaube an Euch Kraft verleihen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta is panting, but her weapon is steadily trained on Marazhai.{/n} "May Thy will fortify my hand, may my faith in Thee grant me strength..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta keucht, hält dabei ihre Waffe aber fest auf Marazhai gerichtet.{/n} "Möge Euer Wille meine Hand stärken, möge mir mein Glaube an Euch Kraft verleihen ..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは喘ぎながらも、彼女の武器はしっかりとマラズハイに向けられている。{/n}「汝の意志が我が手を強固にし、汝への信仰が我に力を授けんことを…」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta is panting, but her weapon is steadily trained on Marazhai.{/n} "May Thy will fortify my hand, may my faith in Thee grant me strength..."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは喘ぎながらも、彼女の武器はしっかりとマラズハイに向けられている。{/n}「汝の意志が我が手を強固にし、汝への信仰が我に力を授けんことを…」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta, nefes nefese olsa da silahını sabit bir şekilde Marazhai'a doğrultuyor.{/n} "İraden elime kuvvet versin, Sana olan inancım bana güç bahşetsin..."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta is panting, but her weapon is steadily trained on Marazhai.{/n} "May Thy will fortify my hand, may my faith in Thee grant me strength..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta, nefes nefese olsa da silahını sabit bir şekilde Marazhai'a tutuyor.{/n} "İraden elime kuvvet versin, Sana olan inancım bana güç bahşetsin..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
